channel.title: Forum Developer
channel.description:
[b]I'm looking to join a project. I don't care what revision, i'd just like to develop the forums. I'll be doing this for free, besides the administrator rank. I've have been a web developer for awhile now, and my recent server shut down.
If you're interested in creating a project with me, or would like me to join yours then contact me through these forums or MSN.
My MSN. -br0k22@yahoo.com[/b]

item.title: Forum Developer
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I’ll start by saying this isn’t allowed, secondly…
Generally when you want people to hire you, the person(s) hiring are going to want some of your previous work, and they’ll want to access your knowledge of Website Development. Anyone can say they do something, doesn’t mean they actually do it. You can learn a couple things here.

  1. As Ruby said, don’t color your text (shows a lack of professionalism).
  2. This is the wrong section.
  3. Post your previous work or at least prove your understanding/knowledge of Website Development.
  4. Team_Rocket would be a great score keeper, if the opportunity was ever presented.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Developer
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Ruby:

If you had any sense of what you were doing then you wouldn’t colour the text in your posts.

Hah!

Ruby - 1

Other Guy - 0

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Developer
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

This board isn’t for saying you’re available, it’s where you can either start a team, or apply on an existing thread.

Read full topic
